example.text: Every rocket launched from Gaza was paid for by Iran. The Iranian regime continues to fund terror and human rights abuses across the Middle East. We must hold the regime accountable.
It’s Infrastructure Week! Since its enactment, over $273 million in Bipartisan Infrastructure Law funds have gone directly to rebuild our roads, drainage, and broadband in TX-34! [[url]]

Announced a $7 Million Grant for Nuestra Clinica del Valle On Monday, December 12th, I announced a grant for Nuestra Clinica del Valle from the US Department of Health and Human Services totaling $7,008,351. This grant will help support and build upon the lifesaving work that Nuestra Clinica del Valle has been doing for our uninsured and underserved populations in South Texas.

The implication that my colleagues think they know better than our community – a community that is dealing firsthand with increased migration is insulting to say the least. “Chairwoman Rodgers should have a field hearing in her home district of Spokane, Washington before coming to the Rio Grande Valley.

Announced a $7 Million Grant for Nuestra Clinica del Valle On Monday, December 12th, I announced a grant for Nuestra Clinica del Valle from the US Department of Health and Human Services totaling $7,008,351. This grant will help support and build upon the lifesaving work that Nuestra Clinica del Valle has been doing for our uninsured and underserved populations in South Texas.

Voted to Pass the Fiscal Year 2023 National Defense Authorization Act On Thursday, December 8th, I voted to pass the House Amendment to the Senate Amendment to HR 7776, the James M Inhofe National Defense Authorization Act . Every year, Congress must pass this legislation to fund our military and ensure our troops have the resources necessary to address threats against our nation, invest in modern technology, and support our defense initiatives.

I introduced legislation this year, HR 8823, the Safe Zones Ac t, to change the asylum process by creating safe zones at the Mexico-Guatemala border to provide a safe place for migrants to apply for asylum. This bill would end the dangerous and deadly trek to our southern border and cut criminal profits out of the equation.
